title: Did Riot remove Mystery Champion Shards?
body: I'm looking in the store that has been down for a few hours and I don't see the Mystery Champion Shards there anymore. Does anybody know of these being removed?

replies.body: Everything looks fine to me!  I'm able to locate championship shards through the accessories section of the store.  Hope that helps locate them!
